title.rendered: PODCAST:  Unpacking The FMC’s Implementation Of OSRA 2022 Part 1

content.rendered:
Doxie Digital · Unpacking The FMC’s Implementation Of OSRA 2022 Part 1

Gabriel and Fernando delve into the implementation of the 2022 OSRA Act by the Federal Maritime Commission, with Gabriel’s valuable insights as a member of the Shippers Advisory Committee. A Customs Brokerage podcast, the show that provides clarity on trade-related matters for people who want to improve their current supply chain process. With our team of experts, we help you navigate the complexities of international trade and provide tailored solutions to optimize your supply chain. Stay tuned for the latest insights and advice on global trade.
